text: The Municipal Youth Secretariat () is a public administration body in Campo Grande, Brazil whose main objective is to develop public policies aimed at the city's youth. SEJUV seeks to promote social inclusion, personal and professional development, civic participation and awareness among young people from Campo Grande. SEJUV's work is of great importance to the local community, as it provides young people with training and development opportunities, preparing them for the job market and encouraging entrepreneurship. Furthermore, the secretariat plays a vital role in training conscious and active citizens in society. == References == ==Other websites== * Official site Category:Government of Brazil
title: Campo Grande Municipal Youth Secretariat
